Battle Cards

Drill Arms

  1. If one of my opponent’s characters has an Armor, can I choose not to scrap it and draw a card?
    No. If there is an enemy Armor, you must scrap it. You draw a card only if you can’t scrap an enemy Armor.
  2. How does Predaking hold five weapons? Does he wad them up into a ball and throw them at his opponents? Besides, those are really big hands -- it's not like he'll be able to squeeze five triggers at once let alone one. How would one wield, like, three axes anyway? Or three Drill Arms? Oh god.
    One finger per trigger.
